That the cost of protection for former Prime Minister
Tony Blair be capped at £2000000 per year. The government to introduce legislation setting out the
annual amount that the taxpayer should fund the protection of Former Prime Ministers.
This will deter Prime Ministers in office from making foolhardy decisions on taking the country to war and making themselves so hated by all and sundry. They are responsible for their own actions and if they put themselves in danger,then they should contribute to their own protection. This is a gross misuse of Taxpayers money.
